text: A wonderful place for me and my family to enjoy a movie. As usual the theater are very clean and seats are very comfortable. Hope these cinemas will still be available in future.

Sound was great! Screen is damaged in 2 spots right in the center of the screen so once you see those dark spots you canâ€™t unsee them. Personally I found that to be really distracting. Felt like 17 degrees so wear more than just a tshirt. Compared to other IMAX theaters I found the resolution to be lacking. From row C I could see the individual pixels. Subtitles were quite pixelated. Seems like this IMAX is on the technical stand of 2010.
After buying the popcorn deal, had to come back into the queue and wait to get my popcorn. Very dissatisfied with this system

Best cinema experience in the heartlands with a large 10m x 18m screen. To watch the latest blockbusters like Avatar2 and Ant Man3. Worth the higher ticket price! First IMAX in Singapore also to be I the basement area so as not to disturb the other residents.

One of the ticket inspectors was very rude. As it was the first time for me and my friend to go to the cinema, I didn't know where the room was, so I consulted him once. The first time, his attitude was not good and he didn't give a clear answer. Bad attitude
